channel.title: Dying in mini game and getting stuck
channel.description: Ok I made a clan wars mini game and now when I kill someone in it they die but They just lay down there and evountaly get back up but they cant move when there down or get up. Why si this?

item.title: Dying in mini game and getting stuck
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

Ok whats the case for walking ? and also how come when I’m weilding a d scimi or have one when I log out its not there anymore + the cash that it costed didnt go back into inventory

Read full topic
item.source: Dying in mini game and getting stuck

item.title: Dying in mini game and getting stuck
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You most likely can’t walk because you’re not returning the death boolean false once the player has died. This is checked in the walking packet, if the boolean is true, then the player will not move.

Read full topic
item.source: Dying in mini game and getting stuck

item.title: Dying in mini game and getting stuck
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Make sure it’s supposed to tele u when u die.

Read full topic
item.source: Dying in mini game and getting stuck
